page.title: 08CRAFTY CRAFT RACE NEWBURY
page.content: The Crafty Craft Race is an annual event for home made rafts which look rather like carnival floats on water.Crafts have names such as 'The Ark','Captain Hook 'and 'Sunken Electricity'.The idea is to get your boat from a given starting place to Newbury as quickly as possible.There are two different events.The funrunners have to row six and a half miles from Kintbury and the real racers have to row eight and a half miles from Hungerford.The use of the locks is not allowed and competitors have to carry the craft along the towpath before putting it back in the water. The race begins at 9.30 am.and the last boats arrive at about 3.00 pm.The race ends at The Wharf where there is a fair and barbecue .
